import React from 'react'; import Logo2 from '../assets/Logo2.jpeg'; const AboutUs = () => { return (
{/* Title */}

About Us

{/* Content Section */}
{/* Image */}
{/* Text Section */}

Welcome to SIIT

Sree Institute of Info Tech (SIIT) is a leading institute providing high-quality education in full-stack development, specializing in languages like C, C++, and DSA.

With over 20 years of experience in teaching, our institute offers a hands-on approach to learning and development. We provide personalized mentoring to students to help them succeed in the ever-evolving tech industry.

At SIIT, we aim to nurture skilled professionals who will thrive in today's fast-paced, technology-driven world. Our full-stack course prepares you for both front-end and back-end development, equipping you with the knowledge and tools to succeed.

Join us today and start your journey towards becoming a full-stack developer!

{/* Skills Section */}

Our Courses

{/* Skill Buttons */}
); }; export default AboutUs;
